articles.author: Neuroscience News
articles.title: Exercising in Nature Reduces Depression, Improves Health - Neuroscience News
articles.description: Engaging in physical activity in natural settings like parks and beaches could prevent around 13,000 cases of non-communicable diseases annually in England, saving over £100 million in healthcare costs.
